mapper.update: update app set appName = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionClass = #{actionClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appPath = #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, lastUpdated = #{lastUpdated,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, appName, actionClass, appPath, userid, created, lastUpdated from app
